Question: In 1999, this person and Hawn starred in a remake of the 1970 Neil Simon comedy, The Out-of-Towners.
Hints: After high school graduation, this person attended Santa Ana Junior College, taking classes in drama and English poetry.
This person made his first appearance on The Grand Ole Opry on May 30, 2009.
During World War II, in England, this person's father had appeared in a production of Our Town with Raymond Massey.
